data.name: Importing_audiobook_into_iTunes__please_wait
data.value: Importing audiobook into iTunes, please wait!

data.name: Please_put_Disc__discnum__of_the_set_into_your_CD_drive
data.value: Please put Disc <discnum> of the set into your CD drive. Wait until you can see iTunes list all the tracks, then click on OK.

data.name: No_CD_tracks_could_be_read
data.value: No CD tracks could be read. Please check CD drive and whether iTunes is asking you a question.

data.name: iTunes_is_not_responding_to_MarkAble_control
data.value: iTunes is not responding to MarkAble control. Minimize MarkAble and check to see if iTunes is attempting to ask you a question.

data.name: iTunes_is_still_not_responding
data.value: iTunes is still not responding to MarkAble control. Giving up.

data.name: Cancelling
data.value: Cancelling. However, you can resume ripping this book at a later time, if you wish.

data.name: Converting_this_track_seems_to_be_taking_a_very_long_time
data.value: Converting this track seems to be taking a very long time.

data.name: Your_iTunes_encoder_preferences_have_been_changed_by_MarkAble
data.value: Your iTunes encoder preferences have been changed by MarkAble.

data.name: If_you_would_like_us_to_restore_your_previous_settings__please_close_iTunes
data.value: If you would like us to restore your previous settings, please close iTunes.

data.name: When_it_has_completely_shut_down__click__Yes
data.value: When it has completely shut down, click 'Yes'.

data.name: Unable_to_create_local_app_data_folder
data.value: Unable to create local app data folder

data.name: Your_preferred_encoding_rate_has_not_been_set_in_iTunes
data.value: Your preferred encoding rate has not been set in iTunes.

data.name: If_you_wish_MarkAble_to_set_this_rate__please_close_down_iTunes
data.value: If you wish MarkAble to set this rate, please close down iTunes.

data.name: When_it_has_fully_closed_down__then_click__Yes__below
data.value: When it has fully closed down, then click 'Yes' below.

data.name: A_new_version_of_MarkAble_is_available
data.value: A new version of MarkAble (version <versionnum>) is available. Go to the web site to download it now?

data.name: It_looks_as_if_you_didn_t_finish_processing_CDs_for_booktitle
data.value: It looks as if you didn't finish processing CDs for '<booktitle>' by <author>.

data.name: Files_so_far_ripped_were_encoded_as_filetype
data.value: Files so far ripped were encoded as <filetype>.

data.name: Your_current_preferences_are_for_encodertype_encoding
data.value: Your current preferences are for <encodertype> encoding.

data.name: If_you_say_Yes_you_ll_never_be_prompted_to_resume_this_project_again
data.value: If you say 'Yes' you'll never be prompted to resume this project again.

data.name: It_looks_as_if_you_didn_t_finish_processing_files_for_booktitle
data.value: It looks as if you didn't finish processing files for '<booktitle>' by <author>

data.name: Please_set_the_CD_drive_in_Step_1
data.value: Please set the CD drive in Step 1

data.name: Please_set_the_author_s_name_in_Step_4
data.value: Please set the author's name in Step 4

data.name: Please_set_the_book_s_title_in_Step_3
data.value: Please set the book's title in Step 3

data.name: We_ll_now_start_to_convert_the_tracks_from_each_disc_to_an__encodertype__format
data.value: We'll now start to convert ('rip') the tracks from each disc to an <encodertype> format. Each disc should take about 2 to 5 minutes to process.

data.name: File_will_be_totsize_MB_in_size_duration_hours
data.value: File will be <totsize>MB in size, duration <duration> hours.

data.name: Each_file_will_be_approx_totsize_MB_in_size
data.value: Each file will be approx. <totsize>MB in size.

data.name: Each_file_will_be_approx_totsize_MB_in_size_duration_duration
data.value: Each file will be approx. <totsize>MB in size, duration <duration> hours.

data.name: MP3_files_can_t_have_chapter_stops
data.value: MP3 files can't have chapter stops, sorry, but you can set an image which iTunes will use as cover artwork.

data.name: Audiobooks_on_the_iPod_can_have_chapter_stops
data.value: Audiobooks on the iPod can have chapter stops to make navigation easier. Choose from the options below:

data.name: Files_will_be_too_big_to_play_at_the_current_sampling_rate
data.value: Files will be too big to play at the current sampling rate unless you increase the number of parts or you are encoding at a lower rate.

data.name: Files_will_be_larger_than_recommended_size_and_or_duration
data.value: Files will be larger than recommended size and/or duration unless you increase the number of parts.

data.name: All_MP3_files_have_now_been_converted_to_bookmarking_format
data.value: All files have now been converted to bookmarking format and placed into iTunes. Look for the files in your 'Music' folder, genre 'Audiobook'.

data.name: Some_problems_were_encountered_during_merging
data.value: Some problems were encountered during merging:

data.name: However_processing_continued_and_the_merged_file_may_be_OK
data.value: However, processing continued and the merged file may be OK.

data.name: Unable_to_move_converted_file_to_path
data.value: Unable to move converted file to <path>

data.name: Unable_to_set_cover_artwork_and_bookmarking_in_iTunes
data.value: Unable to set cover artwork and bookmarking in iTunes. You may need to set this manually.

data.name: Bad_file_type_in_list
data.value: Bad file type in list! : expecting MP3, got <filetype>.

data.name: Are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_this_project_permanently_from_the_batch_file
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove this project permanently from the batch file?

data.name: The_batch_file_is_now_empty_Delete_it_query
data.value: The batch file is now empty. Delete it?

data.name: You_appear_to_have_entered_a_registration_key_for_an_earlier_version_of_MarkAble
data.value: You appear to have entered a registration key for an earlier version of MarkAble.

data.name: MarkAble_has_been_updated_and_you_will_require_a_new_registration_key
data.value: MarkAble has been updated and you will require a new registration key.

data.name: You_may_have_selected_too_many_files_at_once
data.value: You may have selected too many files at once.

data.name: Try_adding_files_in_smaller_groups_or_use_Select_Folder
data.value: Try adding files in smaller groups, or use 'Select Folder'

data.name: All_of_the_files_you_have_selected_are_protected_by_Digital_Rights_Management
data.value: All of the files you have selected are protected by Digital Rights Management (DRM).

data.name: Unfortunately_ITunes_cannot_process_DRM_protected_files
data.value: Unfortunately ITunes (and therefore MarkAble) cannot process DRM protected files.

data.name: Some_of_the_files_you_have_selected_are_protected_by_Digital_Rights_Management
data.value: Some of the files you have selected are protected by Digital Rights Management (DRM).

data.name: However_you_can_resume_converting_this_book_at_a_later_time_if_you_wish
data.value: However, you can resume converting this book at a later time, if you wish.

data.name: Please_set_the_creator_s_name_in_Step_4
data.value: Please set the creator's name in Step 4

data.name: Unable_to_determine_file_size_and_duration
data.value: Unable to determine file size and duration.

data.name: Each_file_will_have_duration_duration_hours
data.value: Each file will have duration <duration> hours.

data.name: This_batchfile_already_contains_the_following_projects
data.value: This batchfile already contains the following projects

data.name: If_you_say_YES__this_project_will_be_added_to_the_existing_batchfile
data.value: If you say YES, this project will be added to the existing batchfile. If you say NO, you'll be prompted for a different file name.

data.name: All_files_to_be_processed_appear_to_be_fileformat_files
data.value: All files to be processed appear to be <fileformat> files.

data.name: If_all_of_these_files_have_been_encoded_the_same_way__you_can_skip_the_conversion_process
data.value: If all of these files have been encoded the same way, you can skip the conversion process and go straight to merge.

data.name: We_re_now_converting_all_the_audio_files_into_fileformat_format
data.value: We're now converting all the audio files into <fileformat> format. This can take quite a long while!

data.name: Do_you_want_MarkAble_to_change_the_iTunes_encoder_rate_now_query
data.value: Do you want MarkAble to change the iTunes encoder rate now?

data.name: If_so__and_if_iTunes_is_running_quit_iTunes
data.value: If so, and if iTunes is running, quit iTunes and when it has fully closed down, click on 'Yes'.

data.name: Evaluation_expired
data.value: Sorry, your evaluation period has now expired.

data.name: Could_not_find_some_of_the_files_in_project_booktitle
data.value: Could not find some of the files in project <booktitle>.

data.name: Remove_the_project_from_the_batch_query
data.value: Remove the project from the batch?

data.name: Project_added_to_batch
data.value: The project was added to the batch file
